name: Include naming convention
description: ABAP Includes should begin with Y, Z, LY, or LZ. This reports shows all the ABAP includes not starting with one of these these prefixes. Prefixes are parameters and can be changed at will.
output:
This report lists all ABAP Includes that does not respect the naming conventions.
It provides the following information:
ABAP Include full name
rationale: For readability aspects and to respect SAP standard, naming conventions must be respected.
remediation: Change name according to the naming convention.
